attributes.action: Lower the age at which a person can run for council
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why is it that the youth can not have their say?
There are teenagers out there wanting to run for council but can't.
The age should be lowered from 21 to 18, if not lower.
More should be done so that the youth of Britain can have their say on what goes on within our communities, within our country and within our world.
